GK16visa06cu:1865: adakkhiṇā dāṇiṃ si tumaṃ jā evvaṃ bhaṭṭiṇā hatthāvalambidāvi kovaṃ ṇa muñcasi /
GK16visa06cu:1875: yā evaṃ bhartrā hastāvalambitāpi kopaṃ na muñcasīti /
GK16visa06cu:1891: mayā nāma jitaṃ yasya tvayā jaya udīryate” /
GK16visa06cu:1894: yathā caṇḍakauśike---“rājā---nūnamasamīkṣyakāriṇā mayā andheneva sphuracchikhākalāpo jvalanaḥ padbhyāṃ samākrāntaḥ” /
GK16visa06cu:1921: yathā tatraiva---“(rājā haste gṛhītvā sparśaṃ nāṭayati )
GK16visa06cu:1938: tā jāva gadua gadua devīe ṇivedaissam” /
GK16visa06cu:1956: mae vi bhaṭiṇīe pasādeṇa kīlidaṃ jjeva edihiṃ /
GK16visa06cu:1958: ado vi me garuaro pasādo eso,
GK16visa06cu:1959: jaṃ tue ahaṃ ettha ālihidatti kuvidā me piasahī sāariā /
GK16visa06cu:1968: alaṃ śaṅkayā mayāpi bhartryāḥ prasādena krīḍitameva etaiḥ /
GK16visa06cu:1970: ato 'pi me gurutaraḥ prasāda eṣa yattvayāhamatrālikhiteti kupitā me priyasakhī sāgarikā /
GK16visa06cu:1977: atra samaṃ citraphalakenetyādi niṣṭhuraṃ susaṅgatayā pūrvamuktaṃ vacanaṃ vidūṣakoktyupapādakam /
GK16visa06cu:1986: pariṣadiyamṛṣīṇāmeṣa vīro yudhājit saha nṛpatiramātyairlomapādaśca vṛddhaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:1987: ayamaviratayajño brahmavādī purāṇaḥ prabhurapi janakānāmaṅga bho yācakāste //
GK16visa06cu:1994: kekayadeśapakatiriti ṛṣibhiramātyaiśca samam eṣa vṛddho rājā lomapādaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:1995: ayamapi janakānāṃ janakavaṃśasya prabhuḥ sīradhvajaḥ aviratayajño brahmavādī ca /
GK16visa06cu:1996: adruhaḥ drodaśūnyāste prasiddhā yājakāḥ ete iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2001: udāharanti ca ratnāvalyāṃ dvitīye 'ṅke--“ado vi me attraṃ guruaro pasādo--” ityāderārabhya “ṇaṃ hatthe geṇhia pasādehi ṇam /
GK16visa06cu:2009: ato 'pi me ayaṃ gurutaraḥ prasāda ityāderārabhya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2011: jaṃ kiṇa ahaṃ tata ettha ālihi detyādikamādāvityādyavidhirūpetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2023: aśvatthāmā hata iti pṛthāsūnunā spaṣṭamuktvā svairaṃ śeṣe gaja iti punarvyāhṛtaṃ satyavācā /
GK16visa06cu:2030: tacchrutvāsau dayitatanayaḥ pratyayāttasya rājñaḥ śastrāṇyājau nayanasalilaṃ cāpi tulyaṃ mumoca //
GK16visa06cu:2046: manaḥ prakṛtyaiva calaṃ durlakṣyaṃ ca tathāpi me /
GK16visa06cu:2062: yo yaḥ śastraṃ bibharti svabhujagurumadaḥ pāṇḍavīnāṃ camūnāṃ yo yaḥ pāñcālagotre śiśuradhikavayā garbhaśayyāṃ gato vā /
GK16visa06cu:2064: carati mayi raṇo yaśca yaśca pratīpaḥ krodhāndhastasya tasya svayamiha jagatāmantakasyāntako 'ham //
GK16visa06cu:2069: mayi raṇe carati sāta pāṇḍavīnāṃ camūnāṃ madhye svabhujagurumadaḥ san yo yaḥ śastraṃ bibhirti evaṃ yo yaḥ pāñcālagotra ityādi /
GK16visa06cu:2072: evaṃ yaśca yaśca mama pratīmaḥ krodhāndho 'haṃ jagatamantakasya tasya tasyāntaka ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2076: yathā śāsuntale---“rājā---sthāne khalu vismṛtanimeṣeṇa cakṣuṣā priyāmavalokayāmi /
GK16visa06cu:2083: bhāvasyānurāgasya tattvenopalabdhirityarthaḥ unnamiteti---padāni ślokaghaṭakadāni racayantyāḥ asyā ānanaṃ kartṛ pulakāñcitena kapolena mayi anurāgaṃ kathayati ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2095: sāmnā prītyā dānena ca saṃpradānasya dīpamānadhanasaṃpattirityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2110: tasya kīdṛśasya gatairgamanairapi dharitro taraṅgayataḥ cālayataḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2114: ratiharṣotsavānāṃ tu prārthanaṃ prārthanā bhavet // VisSd_6.98 //
GK16visa06cu:2121: rabhasānniḥ śaṅkamāliṅgya mā- maṅgani tvamanaṅgatāpavidhurāṇyehyehi nirvāpaya //
GK16visa06cu:2125: ratyarthaṃ yo nāyikāyā harṣo nāyakasya tādṛśotsavānāṃ prārthanetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2128: ehi ehi rabhasāt balāt madaṅgāni niḥ śaṅkamāliṅgya anaṅgatāpavidhurāṇi tāni nirvāpaya /
GK16visa06cu:2137: (vi, pha) atraitadaṃśasya nirvahaṇasandheḥ praśastināmāṅgasya vaikalpikā sthitiḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2138: anayormilitasthitasattve tu vakṣyamāṇacatuḥ ṣaṣṭisaṃkhyāsāndhyaṅgānāṃ na bhavati /
GK16visa06cu:2140: tathā hi atra garbhasandhau etadaṅgasattve etānyaṅgani trayodaśa bhavanti,
GK16visa06cu:2145: ato yanmate nirvahaṇasandhau praśastināmakaṃ caramāṅgaṃ nāsti tanmate evātredam aṅgamanyathā tu netyāha--idañceti /
GK16visa06cu:2161: dvitīye mṛtadroṇasya dhṛṣṭadyumnena keśagrahe 'tra sarvasaṃhārarūpasya rahasyasya utpattisūcanam /
GK16visa06cu:2172: hariścandraṃ nṛpaṃ prati pṛthivīdānadakṣiṇādānārthaṃ viścāmitrasya sakrodhavāka /
GK16visa06cu:2188: citraśālikāyāṃ rājñaḥ samīpe vāsavadattāveśena sāgarikāmānetuṃ tayā saha vasantakena
GK16visa06cu:2189: saṃkete kṛte kāñcanamālayā tajjñātvā vāsavadattāmevānīya vasantakasthāne sāgarikā'gatā
GK16visa06cu:2195: sa karṇāriḥ sa ca krūro vṛkakarmā vṛkodaraḥ //
GK16visa06cu:2201: sa karṇārirarjunaḥ sa ca kūrakarmmā kūro vṛkodaro bhīmaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2209: śaṅkayā aniṣṭaśaṅkayā bhayatrāsau tatkṛto yaḥ saṃbhramaḥ vyākulatā vidravo mata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2219: krodhoddhūtaṃ krodhakampitaṃ daśānanaṃ vilokya vāna rānīke ko 'pi saṃbhramo 'jāyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2223: śaktiḥ prasaṅgaḥ śedaśca pratiṣedho virodhanam // VisSd_6.101 //
GK16visa06cu:2245: kṛṣṭā keśeṣu bhāryā tava tava ca paśostasya rājñastayorvā pratyaśraṃ bhūpatīnāṃ mama bhuvanapaterājñayā dyūtadāsī /
GK16visa06cu:2246: tasmin verānubandhe vada kimapakṛtaṃ tairhatā ye narendrā bāhvorvoryātibhāradraviṇagurumadaṃ māmajitvaiva darpaḥ //
GK16visa06cu:2255: kṛṣṭā iti--tava bhīmasya tava arjunasya tasya rājño yudhiṣṭhirasya vā paśostayornakulasahadevayorvā paśvorbhāryā,
GK16visa06cu:2256: bhuvanapatermama ājñayā nṛpatīnāṃ samakṣaṃ dyūtadāsī keśeṣu kṛṣṭā /
GK16visa06cu:2257: ye narendrā yuṣmābhirhatāstaistādṛśe vairānubandhe kimapakṛtaṃ tadvada /
GK16visa06cu:2258: tān jitvā yo darpaḥ sa kiṃ māmajitveti kākudhvaniviśeṣavaśāj jitvaiva darpa iti gamyate /
GK16visa06cu:2285: kṣatriyāṇāṃ na dharmo rūḍhaṃ sakhyaṃ tadapi gaṇitaṃ nānujasyārjunena /
GK16visa06cu:2286: tulyaḥ kāmaṃ bhavatu bhavataḥ śiṣyayoḥ snehabandhaḥ ko 'yaṃ panthā yadasi vimukho mandabhāgye mayi tvam /
GK16visa06cu:2293: kṛṣṇagrajeti subhadrābhrātariti ca dvayaṃ svapakṣānurāgaucityāya sambandhapradarśanam /
GK16visa06cu:2296: kṣatriyāṇāṃ dharmo 'pi manasi na kṛta ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2299: tavānujasya śrīkṛṣṇasya arjunena saha rūḍhaṃ tatsakhyamapi na gaṇitam /
GK16visa06cu:2309: janmendovimale kule vyapadiśasyadyāpi dhatse gadāṃ māṃ duḥ śāsanakoṣṇaśoṇitamadhukṣībaṃ ripuṃ manyase /
GK16visa06cu:2310: darpāndho madhukaiṭabhadviṣi harāvapyuddhataṃ ceṣṭase trāsānme nṛ-paśo /
GK16visa06cu:2321: duḥ śāsanasya koṣṇenālpoṣṇena śoṇitamadhunā kṣībaṃ mattaṃ māṃ ripuṃ bhāṣase /
GK16visa06cu:2322: na tu kāryeṇa prāṇadātāraṃ bhāṣasa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2323: mudhukaiṭabhadviṣi śrīkṛṣṇe 'pi darpāndhaḥ uddhataṃ sāhaṅkāraṃ ceṣṭase /
GK16visa06cu:2324: he nṛpaśo / me mattastrāsāt samaraṃ vihāyādhunā sa tvaṃ kathaṃ paṅke līyase ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2330: “kurvantvāptā hatānāṃ raṇaśirasi janā bhasmasād dehabhārā- naśrūnmiśraṃ kathañciddadatu jalamamī bāndhavā bāndhavebhyaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2331: mārgantāṃ jñātidehān hatanaragahane khaṇḍitān gṛdhrakaṅkaiḥ- rastaṃ bhāsvān prayātaḥ saha ripubhirayaṃ saṃhrintāṃ balāni //
GK16visa06cu:2339: tathā amī bāndhavāḥ kathañcit astrairmiśraṃ jalaṃ bāndhavebhyo dadatu /
GK16visa06cu:2340: tathā hatanaragahane gṛdhrakākaiḥ khaṇḍitān jñātidehān mārgantām /
GK16visa06cu:2345: yathā mṛcchakaṭikāyām---“cāṇḍālakaḥ---eso kkhu sāgaladattassa sudo ajjavismadattasma
GK16visa06cu:2346: ṇattio cāludatto vāvādiduṃ vañjhaṭṭhāṇaṃ ṇijjai edeṇa kila gaṇiā vasantaseṇā suaṇṇaloheṇa vāvādi detti /
GK16visa06cu:2356: hantuṃ nīyamānaṃ cārudattaṃ dṛṣṭvā cāṇḍālaka āha ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2358: eṣa sagaradattasya suta āryaviśvadattasya naptā cārudattaḥ vyāpādayituṃ vadhyasthānaṃ nīyate /
GK16visa06cu:2359: etena kila gaṇikā vasantasenā suvarṇalobhena vyāpāditeti (saṃskṛtam ) /
GK16visa06cu:2361: yanmama gotraṃ paripūtaṃ tathā purastāt pūrvakāle nibiḍaiścaityairudbhaṭairbrahmaghoṣaiḥ sadasi udbhāṣitaṃ sabhāyāmuccaiḥ-- svareṇa brāhmaṇaiḥ praśastamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2362: nidhanadaśāyāṃ varttamānasya mama tadrotraṃ pāpaiḥ asadṛśamanuṣyaiścāṇḍālaiḥ vadhyaghoṣaṇāyāmuddhoṣyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2370: dalati hṛdayaṃ gāḍhodvego dvidhā na bhidyate vahati vikalaḥ kāyo mohaṃ na muñcati cetanām /
GK16visa06cu:2380: na vidīryate na tu dvikhaṇḍaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2384: strastāṃśāvatimātralohitatalau bāhū ghaṭotkṣepaṇā- dadyāpi stanavepathuṃ janayati śvāsaḥ pramāṇādhikaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2385: baddhaṃ karṇaśirīṣarodhivadane gharmāmbhasāṃ jālakam bandhe straṃsini caikahastayamitāḥ paryākulā mūrddhajāḥ //
GK16visa06cu:2389: yathā mama prabhāvatyāṃ vidūṣakaṃ prati pradyumnaḥ---sakhe /
GK16visa06cu:2391: kva nu punaḥ priyasakhījanānugamyamānā priyatamā me prabhāvatī ?
GK16visa06cu:2392: vidūṣakaḥ- asura vaiṇā āāria kahiṃ vi ṇīdā /
GK16visa06cu:2403: asuravaiṇeti---asurapatinā ākṛṣya kutrāpi nītā iti saṃskṛtam /
GK16visa06cu:2404: hā pūrṇacandra iti pūrvārdhe priyāṃ sambodhya śocitvāparārddhe jīvitaṃ sambodhya āha gaccha tvamadyati /
GK16visa06cu:2405: tatra eva kadarthanaparaṃ daivaṃ kṛtakṛtyamastu ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2410: tīrṇe bhīṣmamahodadhau kathamapi droṇānale nivṛte karṇāśīviṣabhogini praśamite śalye ca yāte divam /
GK16visa06cu:2411: bhīmena priyasāhasena rabhāsādalpāvaśeṣe jaye sarva jīvitasaṃśayaṃ vayamamī vācā samāropitāḥ //
GK16visa06cu:2420: alpāvaśeṣe jaye priyasāhasena bhīmena sarve vayaṃ jīvitasaṃśayaṃ prāpitā ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2428: yathā veṇyām---“pāñcālakaḥ--ahaṃ devena cakrapāṇinā sahitaḥ---” ityupakramya kṛtaṃ sandehena /
GK16visa06cu:2429: pūryantāṃ salilena ratnakalaśā rājyābhiṣekāya te kṛṣṇātyantacirojjhite tu kabarībandhe karotu kṣaṇam /
GK16visa06cu:2430: rāme śātakuṭhārabhāsvarakare kṣatradrumocchedini kramadhāndhe ca vṛkodare paripatatyājau kutaḥ saṃśayaḥ” //
GK16visa06cu:2437: gadāyuddhe bhīmajayajijñāsārthaṃ kṛṣṇena prahitasya pāñcālakasya yudhiṣṭhiraṃ prati uktiriyam /
GK16visa06cu:2439: atyantacirojjhite 'pi kabarībandhe kṛṣṇā draupadī kṣaṇamutsavaṃ karotu ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2442: śātakuṭhāreṇa bhāsurakare kṣatrarūpadrumocchedini rāme paraśurāme vṛkodare ca krodhāndhe ājau paripatati gacchati sati kuto jayasaṃśaya ityarthaḥ
GK16visa06cu:2446: nāhaṃ rakṣo na bhūto ripurudhirajalāhlāditāṅgaḥ prakāmaṃ nistīrṇorupratijñājalanidhigahanaḥ krodhanaḥ kṣatriyo 'smi /
GK16visa06cu:2460: krodhanaḥsan ripurudhirajalena kleditāṅgaḥ prīṇitāṅgaḥ san prakāmaṃ yatheṣṭaṃ nistīrṇaḥ mahāpratijñārūpe jalanidhitvaṃ vanatvaṃ ca rūpitaṃ bodhyam
GK16visa06cu:2474: apriyāṇi karotveṣa vācā śakto na karmaṇā /
GK16visa06cu:2505: (vi, ḍa) kauravaśataṃ hatvā bhavati yajñetyādikaṃ bhīmasyoktiḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2508: mukhe prathamataḥ kṣiptamupanyastaṃ pratijñayā bodhitaṃ bījaṃ pratijñātārtharūpaṃ punarupagataṃ jñāpitamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2514: saṃyamayāmi tāvadanena suyodhanaśoṇitokṣitena pāṇinā pāñcālyā duḥśāsanāvakṛṣṭaṃ keśahastam /
GK16visa06cu:2529: na khalu mayi jīvati saharṃttavyā duḥśāsanavilulitā veṇirātmapāṇibhyām /
GK16visa06cu:2545: bhūmau kṣiptaṃ śarīraṃ nihatamidamasṛkcandanābhaṃ nijāṅge takṣmīrārye niṣaktā caturudadhipayaḥ sīmayā sārddhamurvyā /
GK16visa06cu:2546: bhṛtyā mitrāṇi yodhāḥ kurukulamanujā dagdhametadraṇāgnau nāmaikaṃ yadbravīṣi kṣitipa /
GK16visa06cu:2553: tasya durātmano duryyodhanasya śarīraṃ mayā bhūmau kṣiptaṃ pātitam /
GK16visa06cu:2560: he kṣitipa / dhārttarāṣṭrasya yannāma bravīṣi adhunā tadeva śeṣamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2565: atha sā tatrabhavatī kimākhyasya rājarṣeḥ patnī ? /
GK16visa06cu:2571: parivādeti parivādenārthena kṛtaṃ vākyaṃ parivādārthakaṃ vākyamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2573: paścāttāṃ smṛtvā tāmanāsādya virahiṇaḥ svargādāgacchatastāpasīmukhāt tatprasaṅgaṃ
GK16visa06cu:2579: yathā veṇyām--“kṛṣṇaḥ--ete bhagavanto vyāsa--vālmīkiprabhṛtayo 'bhiṣekaṃ dhārayantastiṣṭhanti” iti /
GK16visa06cu:2591: yathā tatraiva---“draupadī---visumaridaṃ edaṃ vāvāraṃ ṇādhassa pasādeṇa puṇo vi sikkhissaṃ” /
GK16visa06cu:2596: vismṛtamimaṃ vyāpāraṃ nāthasya prasādena punarapi śikṣiṣye iti saṃskṛtam /
GK16visa06cu:2608: iyaṃ sāgarikāyāḥ mātulakanyakātvena paricaye sati vāsavadattāyā uktiḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2612: yathā mama prabhāvatyāṃ nāradadarśanāt pradyumna ūrddhvamavalokya---
GK16visa06cu:2614: digantaṃ jyotibhistuhinakaragaurairdhavalayannitaḥ kailāsādriḥ patati viyataḥ kiṃ punaridam //
GK16visa06cu:2621: tathā ca kailāsādrerapeto viyato viyato 'vadheḥ patati kaścit padārtha iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2627: parimalena tata ito bhramantīnāṃ bhṛṅgaśreṇīnāṃ dhvanibhirupagītām /
GK16visa06cu:2652: bhānumatī duryyodhanasya patnī tathā dāsīdvārā prāk kaṭūktiḥ kṛtā /
GK16visa06cu:2667: rājānaḥ sutanirviśeṣamadhunā paśyantu nityaṃ prajā jīyasuḥ sadasadvivekapaṭavaḥ santo
GK16visa06cu:2668: guṇagrāhiṇaḥ sasyasvarṇasamṛddhayaḥ samadhikāḥ santu kṣamāmaṇḍale bhūyādavyabhicāriṇī
GK16visa06cu:2676: adhunā sutanirviśeṣaṃ yathā syāt tathā rājānaḥ prajāḥ paśyantu /
GK16visa06cu:2677: guṇagrāhiṇaḥ santaḥ śiṣṭā jīyāsuḥ utkarṣabhājo bhavantu,
GK16visa06cu:2679: kṣamāmaṇḍale śasyānāṃ suvarṇānāñca samṛddhayaḥ samadhikāḥ santu /
GK16visa06cu:2680: nārāyaṇe cāvyabhicāriṇī akādācitkī bhaktiḥ trijagatāṃ bhūyāditi nṛpadeśādiśāntiḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2684: “iha ca mukhasaṃdhau upakṣepaparinyāsayuktyudbhedasamādhānānāṃ pratimukhe ca parisarpaṇapragamanavajropanyāsapuṣpāṇāṃ garbhe 'bhūtāharaṇamargatro
GK16visa06cu:2686: anyeṣāṃ ca yathāsambhavaṃ sthitiḥ” iti kecit /
GK16visa06cu:2689: (vi, ya) sandhiṣu yānyaṅgānyuktāni teṣu katicit aṅgānyeva āvaśyakatvena pradhānānīti kecidāhuḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2708: rasānuguṇānurodhena tu ekasandheraṅgani anyasandhāvapi kuryyādityāha---kuryyādaniyate iti /
GK16visa06cu:2709: aniyate sandhavapi tasyāṅgasya niveśanaṃ kuryyāt ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2730: prakāśyānāmarthānāṃ prakāśanañceti prayogasya mukhasandhyādiprayogasya aṅgānāmupakṣepādyaṅgānāṃ ṣaṭ phalānītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2731: yathā kāvyārthetpattirūpasya upakṣeparūpasya mukhasandhyaṅgasya iṣṭānusaraṇaṃ phalam /
GK16visa06cu:2734: (lo, ī) yadvastu gopayitumiṣṭaṃ tadaṅgasvarūpavijñāpanena sukhena gopayitu evaṃ prakāśyānāṃ prakāśaścetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2737: aṅgahīnaṃ tathā kāvyaṃ na prayogāya yujyate // VisSd_6.118 //
GK16visa06cu:2749: atra ca tatsambandhāt nāyakasahāya eva tattvenoktaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2759: (vi, śa) upakṣepādyaṅgatrayasya ca pradhānanāyaketareṇa samuddiṣṭatve eva sādhutā ityāha--kintūpakṣepeti /
GK16visa06cu:2762: pradhānapuruṣasya dhīrodāttatvena karttavyetivṛttabījasamuddeśasya alpasyāpi tena karaṇānaucityād iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2763: tathā hi kāvyārthasya samutpattirūpaṃ yadupakṣeparūpamaṅgaṃ tena veṇyāṃ lākṣāgṛhānaletyādi bhīmoktyā kurukulavadharūpakāvyārthasya tasya bījasamutpattiḥ pratipāditā /
GK16visa06cu:2771: bījoddeśamātrādeva nāyakasya dhīrodāttatvabhaṅga ityatra eva tātparyyāt /
GK16visa06cu:2775: tathā ca yadveṇyāṃ duryodhanasya bhānumatyā saha vipralambho darśitaḥ,
GK16visa06cu:2782: kintu rasavyañjanāpekṣayā eva eṣāṃ niveśanaṃ na tu nāṭyasāstroktasthitisampādanecchayā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2783: yadyapīdaṃ prāgapyuktaṃ tathāpi rasavyaktyanapekṣayā karaṇe doṣa tvapratipādanāya purarūktam /
GK16visa06cu:2797: svasyopakrāntavṛttasya viruddhamadhikaṃ yad vṛttaṃ vṛttāntaḥ tadapi rasābhivyaktaye 'nyathayedupakrāntarasāviruddhatayā pratipādayet /
GK16visa06cu:2802: rase raudre ca bībhatse vṛttiḥ sarvatra bhāratī // VisSd_6.122 //
GK16visa06cu:2809: nāyakādīnāṃ vyāpāraviśeṣāścatastro vṛttayo nāṭakādiṣu nāṭakaprakaraṇādidaśarūpakeṣu nāṭikādyaṣṭādaśoparūpakeṣu ca sarvanāṭyasya mātṛkā mūlabhūtāḥ jananya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2820: (lo, u) kāmena madanena hetunā ya upabhogaḥ sambhogastatkāraṇāni upacārāścandracandanaghanasārādayo yasyām /
GK16visa06cu:2845: śuddhena saśṛṅgāreṇa samayena ca hāsyena vihitamiti traividhyam /
GK16visa06cu:2849: esā vi avarā tava samīve jadhālihidā edaṃ kiṃ ajjavasantassa viṇṇāṇam /
GK16visa06cu:2853: eṣāpyaparā tava samīpe yā ālikhitā etat kimāryavasantakasya vijñānam ? (saṃskṛtam) /
GK16visa06cu:2854: citraphalake sāgarikayā likhitaṃ rājānaṃ dṛṣṭvā susaṅgatayā tatsamīpe sāgarikāpi likhitā /
GK16visa06cu:2855: tatra likhitaṃ rājānaṃ dṛṣṭvā vāsavadattayā pṛṣṭaṃ kena tvamatra likhitā iti /
GK16visa06cu:2857: tatastadantike sāgarikāṃ likhitāṃ dṛṣṭvā “eṣā krodhena tasyāḥ śṛṅgārābhāvāt /
GK16visa06cu:2860: saśṛṅgārahāsyena yathā śākuntale--rājānaṃ prati śakuntalā--asaṃtuṭṭho uṇa kiṃ karissadi /
GK16visa06cu:2869: nanu kamalasya madhukaraḥ santuṣyati gandhamātreṇa iti rājña uktyanantaraṃ śakuntalāyā iyaṃ pṛcchā /
GK16visa06cu:2873: sabhayahāsyena yathā ratnāvalyām---ālekhyadarśanāvasare susaṃgatā--jāṇido mae eso vuttanto samaṃ cittaphalaeṇa /
GK16visa06cu:2882: atra rājño bhītiyuktena susaṅgatāyā hāsena vihitaṃ narma vaidaghdhyakrīḍitam /
GK16visa06cu:2888: tatra sāgarikāyāḥ saṅketabhaṅgārthaṃ tadveśāyā vāsavadattāyā āgamane veśena bodhyam /
GK16visa06cu:2897: devīe bhaeṇa appaṇo vi pia kauṃ ṇa pāremi” ityādi /
GK16visa06cu:2907: nanu bhościrāt praṇayonmukhe mayi atimuktalatāyāḥ mādhavīlatāyāścaritaṃ gṛhāṇa /
GK16visa06cu:2914: devyāḥ bhayena ātmano 'pi priyaṃ karttuṃ na pārayāmi (saṃskṛtam) /
GK16visa06cu:2921: gamanamalasaṃ śūnyā dṛṣṭiḥ śarīramasauṣṭhavaṃ śvasitamadhikaṃ kintvetat syāt kimadanyadito 'thavā /
GK16visa06cu:2922: bhramati bhuvane kandarpājñā vikāri ca yauvanaṃ lalitamadhurāste te bhāvāḥ kṣipanti ca dhīratām //
GK16visa06cu:2935: atrottarottarādhikādhikasambhāvanāyāṃ pūrvoktaiḥ sūcitasya bhāvasya leśa evetyāha---alasetyādi /
GK16visa06cu:2949: pitrā rājājñayā jarate nandanāya dātuṃ kṛtaniścayā mālatīti devatagṛhe svamaraṇaṃ prārthayantī lavaṅgikāyāḥ pāde patitā mālatī /
GK16visa06cu:2950: stambhantaritasthito mādhavaśca lavaṅgikāveśena āgatya lavaṅgikām apasārya tatsthāne svapādaṃ dattvā sthitaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2951: tato mālatī utthāyā lavaṅgikābuddhyā tamāliṅgya paścād dṛṣṭvā paricīyamānā vyavasāyat nivavṛte ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2961: sattvādibhiḥ samastavyastālpatarair bahulā tadvaiśiṣṭyāt bāhulyavatī harṣādyanyatarayuktā vṛttiśca sāttvatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2964: atra kṣudraśṛṅgāratvena strīsaṃkulatvakāmopabogarāhityena vīrarasatvena kauśikīto viśeṣaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2973: ānandāya ca vismayāya ca mayā dṛṣṭo 'si duḥkhāya vā vaitṛṣṇyantu mamāpi samprati kutastvaddarśane cakṣuṣaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2974: tvatsāṅgatyasukhasya nāsmi viṣayastat kiṃ vṛthā vyāhṛtaiḥ ?
GK16visa06cu:2978: (vi, ṭha) ānandāya ceti---paraśurāmāgame rāmaṃ prati janakasya vākyamidam /
GK16visa06cu:2982: ato 'dya tvaddarśane samprati etat kṣaṇe cakṣuṣaḥ kuto vaitṛṣṇayam /
GK16visa06cu:2983: utkaṇṭhābāhulyāt kṣaṇāntare 'niṣṭanivṛttau tu utkaṇṭhānivṛttyā vaitṛṣṇyaṃ syāditi samprati padabhāvārthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2986: ato 'smin viṃsmṛtasya jāmadagnyasya vijayanimittaṃ tava bāhau dhanurjṛmbhatāmityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2988: atra vismayavaśād rāmaśauryyeṇānandādinā ca vaiśiṣṭyaṃ vīro rasaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:2991: mantraśaktyā yathā---mudrārākṣase rākṣasasāyānāṃ cāṇakyena svabuddhyā bhedanam /
GK16visa06cu:2997: mantrasya mantraṇārthasya dhanasya daivasyādṛṣṭasya vā śakteḥ śaktihetoḥ saṃghasya sainyasamūhasya bhedanamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3001: atra cāṇakyasya sattvadānānekasattvaṃ saṃghabhedanavaśād vīro rasaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3005: yaḥ kila saparivārakārttikeyavijayāvajītena bhagavatā nīlalohite parivatsarasahastrāntevāsine tubhyaṃ prasādīkṛtaḥ paraśuḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3014: atra kautukeneva vijayo na tu vāstava iti tatpitṛprasādagamyam /
GK16visa06cu:3015: tathāparaprasādalabdhena paraśunā ko 'yaṃ garva iti rāmasya gabhīrātmikā uktiḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3016: paraśurāmoktau tatpriyavastvapi mahyaṃ dattamiti svamahattvakhyāpanameva gabhīratā /
GK16visa06cu:3047: jīyante jayino 'pi sāndratimiravrātairviyadvyāpibhir- bhāsvantaḥ sakalā raverapi karāḥ kasmādakasmādamī /
GK16visa06cu:3055: raverapi amī bhāsvantaḥ sakalāḥ karāḥ akasmādakāle kasmādacchādyante /
GK16visa06cu:3057: ānanarūpābhyaḥ kandarābhyo 'nalamuca ete pheravāḥ śṛgālāśca tīvrān ravān muñcantītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3068: kruddhau ca tau satvarau ceti karmadhārayaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3081: neturnṛtyapātrasya ekasya nivṛttau netrantarasya graha eva saṃkṣiptavasturacanā /
GK16visa06cu:3090: eva sugrīvakilañjahastinoḥ pūrvaṃ raudro raso bodhyaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3116: aśrāvya khalu yadvastu tadiha svagataṃ matam // VisSd_6.137 //
GK16visa06cu:3118: rahasyaṃ tu yadanyasya parāvṛtya prakāśyate // VisSd_6.138 //
GK16visa06cu:3129: tādṛśena kareṇānyamapavāryyācchādya janasyānte antike yat anyonyāmantraṇaṃ kathanaṃ,
GK16visa06cu:3132: kiṃ vravīṣīti yannāṭye vinā pātraṃ prayujyate /
GK16visa06cu:3134: yaḥ kaścidartho yasmādropanīyastasyāntarata ūrdhvaṃ sarvāṅgulināmitānāmikaṃ tripatākalakṣaṇaṃ karaṃ kṛtvānyena saha yanmantryate tajjanāntikam
GK16visa06cu:3148: dattāṃ siddhāṃ ca senāṃ ca veśyānāṃ nāma darśayet /
GK16visa06cu:3154: vasantādiṣu varṇanīyasya vastuno yannāma bhavet ceṭaceṭyostathā nāma ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3164: nāṭake garbhitaḥ pratipādyo yor'thastatprakāśakaṃ nāṭakasya nāma kāryyamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3180: (vi, ra) nāṭikādīnyaṣṭādaśoparūpakāṇi yānyuktani teṣāṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ nāma kābhirnāyikānāmnaivetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3190: tadantaḥ sādhadhātuḥ gameḥ sthāne prāyeṇa prayujyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3194: rājā svamīti deveti bhṛtyairbhaṭṭeti cādhamaiḥ // VisSd_6.144 //
GK16visa06cu:3211: sa rājā ṛṣibhiḥ rājannati apatyapratyayena ca vācya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3216: vayasyetyathavā nāmnā vācyo rājñā viḍhūṣakaḥ // VisSd_6.146 //
GK16visa06cu:3229: sūtradhāraṃ vadedbhāva iti vai pāripārśivakaḥ // VisSd_6.147 //
GK16visa06cu:3245: devarṣayo liṅginaḥ parivrājakāśca sarvaireva bhagavanniti vācyāḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3247: vadedrājñīṃ ca ceṭīṃ ca bhavatīti vidūṣakaḥ // VisSd_6.149 //
GK16visa06cu:3248: āyuṣman rathinaṃ sūto vṛddhaṃ tāteti cetaraḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3251: (vi, ka) rathinaṃ vṛddhasūta āyuṣmanniti itarastu tāteti vadedityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3253: vatsaputrakatāteti nāmnā gotreṇa vā sutaḥ // VisSd_6.150 //
GK16visa06cu:3266: sādho / iti tapasvī ca praśāntaścocyate budhaiḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3282: vācyā prakṛtibhī rājñaḥ kumārī bhartṛdārikā // VisSd_6.154 //
GK16visa06cu:3287: jyeṣṭha uttamastathā cottamamadhyamādhamaiḥ svastriyaḥ strībhiḥ patiryathā tathā vācya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3288: tathā cāryyaputreti patyurucyamānatvāt āryyaiti patyā striyo vācyā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3316: yasya yatkarma śilpaṃ vā vidyā vā jātireva vā // VisSd_6.157 //
GK16visa06cu:3327: śaurasenyādayo bahvyo bhāṣāḥ prākṛtaviśeṣāḥ prākṛtavṛttau anusandheyāḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3329: āsāmeva tu gāthāsu mahārāṣṭrīṃ prayojayet // VisSd_6.159 //
GK16visa06cu:3397: atra nāṭakalakṣaṇāni sakalāni ṣaṭtriṃśaddharmāṇi prayojyāni ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3408: nidarśanābhiprāyau ca prāptirvicāra eva ca // VisSd_6.172 //
GK16visa06cu:3412: pṛcchā prasiddhiḥ sārūpyaṃ saṃkṣepo guṇakīrtanam // VisSd_6.174 //
GK16visa06cu:3426: (vi, da) atra bhūṣaṇasaṃjñakasya lakṣaṇasya lakṣaṇamāha--tatra guṇairiti /
GK16visa06cu:3430: koṣaḥ kuṅbhavā evā ko ṣo dhanam /
GK16visa06cu:3456: siddhairupamānabhūtairarthaiḥ samamekavākyenaiva aprasiddha upameyabhūtor'tho vidheyānvayārthaṃ prakāśate /
GK16visa06cu:3462: kāmaṃ dhanuriva krūro varjanīyaḥ satāṃ prabhuḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3466: dhanuriva krūraḥ prabhuḥ kāma yatheṣṭaṃ satāṃ varjanīyaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3471: koṭi koṭisaṃkhyakaṃ dhanaṃ dadāti tathākoṭyādyatiguṇo jyā śauryādiśca /
GK16visa06cu:3472: atra siddhena dhanuṣā samaṃ prasiddhaḥ krūraḥ prabhuḥ vidheyavarjanānvayārthaṃ prakāśyate /
GK16visa06cu:3487: prakrāntārthatulyāvabodhakena vākyena prakrāntārthasyātiśayitvapradarśanāt abhimato 'tiśayitatvarūpor'thaḥ sādhyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3490: anuyāntyā janātītaṃ kāntaṃ sādhu tvayā kṛtam /
GK16visa06cu:3491: kā dinaśrīrvinārkeṇa kā niśā śaśinā vinā //
GK16visa06cu:3501: atra vākyabhedāt upamānopameyayoḥ samaṃ prakāśanābhāvāt śleṣābhāvācca pūrvasmād bhedaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3511: yathā veṇyāṃ bhīmaṃ prati “ceṭī--evaṃ mae bhaṇidaṃ bhāṇumadi tuhmāṇaṃ amukkesu kesesu kahaṃ devīe kesā saṃjamiantitti /
GK16visa06cu:3516: bhānumati / yuṣmākamamukteṣu keśahasteṣu kathaṃ devyāḥ keśāḥ saṃyamyante iti” (saṃskṛtam)
GK16visa06cu:3517: atra draupadyāḥ keśāsaṃyamanahetau bhānumatyā pṛṣṭe sabhrātṛkaduryodhanavadhābhāve
GK16visa06cu:3518: hetau pradarśayitavye vaidhavyacihnasya bhānumatyāḥ keśamocanasya abhāvo hetuḥ saṃkṣepeṇa pradarśitaḥ,
GK16visa06cu:3524: kiṃ cāsya viṣayasyaiva devatā kimu pārvatī //
GK16visa06cu:3528: ajñātatattvasya janasya vākye śṛṇvatā yadaniścayaḥ sa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3539: ucitamevaitattasyā yato duryodhanakalatraṃ hi sā” ityādi /
GK16visa06cu:3545: atra draupadyā upanyastasya bhānumatyā daurjanyasya duryodhanakalatratvaṃ hetuḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3549: prayeṇaiva hi dṛśyante kāmaṃ svapnāḥ śubhāśubhāḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3557: nakulenāhiśataṃ hatvā bhānumatyāḥ stane kṣata iti bhānumatyā dṛṣṭe svapre kathite duryodhanasyeyamāśaṅkā /
GK16visa06cu:3559: saṃcayor'thānurūpo yaḥ padānāṃ sa padoccayaḥ // VisSd_6.180 //
GK16visa06cu:3568: padānāṃ sañcayaḥ samūho yor'thānurūpaḥ sa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3571: artho yathā komalastathā śabdoccayo 'pi kaṭuvarṇavirahāt komala ityāha---atra padapadārthayoriti /
GK16visa06cu:3576: kiṃ tu bālini rāmeṇa mukto bāṇaḥ parāṅmukhe //
GK16visa06cu:3581: atrādharmayuddhena śatrumāraṇārthaṃ prasiddhasya rāmeṇānyāyena vālivadhasya nidarśanam /
GK16visa06cu:3585: idaṃ kilāvyājamanoharaṃ vapustapaḥ klamaṃ sādhayituṃ ya icchati /
GK16visa06cu:3594: avyājamanoharam akṛtrimaramyaṃ vapuḥ yaḥ ṛṣiḥ kaṇvaḥ tapaḥ kṣamaṃ sādhayitumicchati /
GK16visa06cu:3600: yathā mama prabhāvatyām--“anena khalu sarvataścaratā cañcarīkeṇāvaśyaṃ viditā bhaviṣyati priyatamā me prabhāvatī” /
GK16visa06cu:3629: āryye tvayibhīme jyotiḥ krodhajanitaṃ svatejaḥ sambhṛtamāviṣkṛtam /
GK16visa06cu:3639: bharturviprakṛtāpi roṣaṇatayā mā sma pratīpaṃ gamaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3648: viprakṛtā tiraskṛtāpi roṣaṇatayā bharttuḥ pratīpaṃ mā sma gamaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3650: vāmā upadiṣṭe tad viparītakāriṇyaḥ kulasyādhayo manasaḥ vyathākāriṇyaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3657: jai saṃharijjai tamo dheppai saalehi te pāo /
GK16visa06cu:3658: vasasi sire pasubaiṇo tahavi ha itthīa jīaṇaṃ harasi //
GK16visa06cu:3664: tathā ca svaniṣṭhaguṇānāṃ virodhi yat svakāryyaṃ tadityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3666: tvayā saṃhriyate tamo gṛhyate sakalaistava pādaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3667: vasasi śirasi paśupatestathāpi strīṇāṃ jīvanaṃ harasi //
GK16visa06cu:3680: asāmānyasya anyāvṛtterguṇasāya yo nirdiśyamāne vastuni udreka ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3684: vinā doṣāsaṅgaṃ satataparipūrṇākhilakalaḥ kutaḥ prāptaścandro vigalitakalaṅkaḥ sumukhi / te //
GK16visa06cu:3691: yadvā te tubhyaṃ tava sthāne vā kutaḥ prāptaḥ kuta āgata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3693: antarmadhye cañcat cañcalaṃ vikacanavanīlotpalayugalaṃ yasya tādṛśaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3695: tathā tale 'dhobhāge sphūrjat dīpyamānaḥ kambuḥ rekhātrayaṃ yasya tādṛśaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3698: tathā upari vilasan alisaṅghāto yasya tādṛśaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:3700: tathā doṣārātrerāsaṅga eva doṣāṇāmāsaṅgastaṃ vinā satatameva paripūrṇākhilakalo vigalitakalaṅkaśca /
GK16visa06cu:3707: siddhān upamānopameyasādhāraṇān bahūn utkarṣahetūnarthān dharmān ityarthaḥ /

GK16visa06cu:4775: kathaṃ dṛṣṭā ityāhatvayā virahitā mayā dṛṣṭeti pratiśabdārthasya yojanāddarśanottaraṇaśabdayorekārthatve 'pi darśitarītyā praśrottarabhāvena
GK16visa06cu:4783: atra rājñāṃ prathamārthābhiprāyeṇa praśrarūpārthaṃ vākyamidamuktvā parvate pratidhvanimākarṇya dvitīyārthaḥ parvatasyottaratvenāvagato virahonmādāta
GK16visa06cu:4789: kṛṣṇākeśottarīyavyapanayanapaṭuḥ pāṇḍavā yasya dāsāḥ kvā'ste duryodhano 'sau kathayata,
GK16visa06cu:4797: dyūtacchalādikarttṛtvaviśiṣṭo yastaṃ draṣṭumāgatau svaḥ na tu ruṣā ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4801: atra draṣṭumeva na ruṣeti priyābhena vākyena pratārya upahasanam /
GK16visa06cu:4818: kiṃ tena madyaṃ vinā madyaṃ cāpi tava priyaṃ priyamaho vārāṅganābhiḥ saha /
GK16visa06cu:4819: veśyāpyartharuciḥ kutastava dhanaṃ dyūtena cauryeṇa vā cauryadyūtaparigraho 'pi bhavato,
GK16visa06cu:4824: parihāsāya māṃsaṃ bhakṣantaṃ bhikṣuṃ prati bhikṣo ityādirgṛhiṇaḥ praśraḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4854: adya mama pracaṇḍe bhujadaṇḍe samarpito ya uruḥ kodaṇḍastato nirgalitānāṃ kāṇḍānāṃ bāṇaānāṃ samūhasya (sahastrasya vā pāṭhabhedāt )
GK16visa06cu:4855: pātairiyaṃ kṣauṇī kṣaṇena samastadaityakṣatajaiḥ ukṣitā satī piśitāśanānāṃ lobhanīya āstāmityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4857: gaṇḍaṃ prastutasaṃbandhi bhinnārthaṃ satvaraṃ vacaḥ // VisSd_6.260 //
GK16visa06cu:4868: satvareṇoktatvāt satvaraṃ bhinnārthaṃ vaco yat prastutasya prakrāntasya varṇanaṃ tat sambandhitayā pratīyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4885: ṇa kkhu tumhāṇaṃ saalāe jjeva puhavīetti /
GK16visa06cu:4889: svarasoktasya vaktṛbhāvena utkasya śroturasvarasāt yadanyathā vyākhyānaṃ tadavasyanditamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4892: tatra sa rājā vinayena praṇamitavyaḥ (iti saṃskṛtam) /
GK16visa06cu:4894: jātaḥ sa khalu yuvayoḥ pitā (iti saṃskṛtam) /
GK16visa06cu:4899: na khalu yuvayoḥ kiṃ tu sakalāyā eva pṛthivyā iti (iti saṃskṛtam)
GK16visa06cu:4901: atrapiteti janakaparatayā sītayā svarasoktasya labdhāvasyandanāt tayā eva pālakatayā vyākhyānaṃ kṛtam /
GK16visa06cu:4903: prahelikaiva hāsyena yuktā bhavati nālikā // VisSd_6.261 //
GK16visa06cu:4905: yathā ratnāvalyām---susaṅgatā---sahi jassa kide tumaṃ āadā so ida jjeva ciṭṭhadi /
GK16visa06cu:4906: sāgarikā--kassa kide ahaṃ āadā susaṅgatā--ṇaṃ kkhu cittaphalaassa /
GK16visa06cu:4907: atra tvaṃ rājñaḥ kṛte āgatetyarthaḥ saṃvṛtaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4911: saṃvaraṇakārīti vyākhyānarūpāṅge 'pi saṃvaraṇarūpasya sattve 'pyatra hāsyayuktatvaṃ viśeṣaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4912: sahi jasseti---sakhi yasya kṛte tvamāgatā so 'traiva tiṣṭhatīti saṃskṛtam /
GK16visa06cu:4919: agṛhṇato 'pi mūrkhasya puro yacca hitaṃ vacaḥ // VisSd_6.262 //
GK16visa06cu:4945: atra ca āhāryāropābhāvāt na rūpakaṃ kintu vāstavabhramāt bhrāntimadalaṅkāra eva /
GK16visa06cu:4947: tatra yathā mama-- dvijaḥ śākhāyuktastvayi kṛtakathaḥ kokila iti tvayākhyeyaṃ mande mayi virahipāte kiyadagham /
GK16visa06cu:4948: iti praśre vāyormukulapulakā cūtalatikā dhruvaṃ dhṛtvā mauliṃ na khalu kiyadityuttarayati //
GK16visa06cu:4949: atra hi vātadhūtamaulikāyāṃ cūtalatikāyāṃ mandavayoḥ kati māpapraśre maulipūnanena pāpabhāvottarāropaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4953: kokila eva drupadāmantrasya ṛṣiḥ kokilanāma vedaśākhāyukto dvijaḥ sa tvayi kṛtakatha ityatastvayā mande vedarahite idamapyākhyeyam /
GK16visa06cu:4957: tṛtīyaṃ yathā veṇyāṃ duryodhanaṃ prati gāndhāryā hitavākyam /
GK16visa06cu:4958: athavā pradīyatāṃ dāśarathaye maithilīti rāvaṇaṃ prati vibhīṣaṇasya vākyamidamapi bodhyam /
GK16visa06cu:4969: ityādinā nāyakasya viśuddhanāyikādarśanaprayuktena hāsalobhakāriṇa vacasā vyāhāraḥ /
GK16visa06cu:4979: prathamaṃ brāhmaṇapūjā bhavati sā anayā laṅghitā /
GK16visa06cu:4981: atra parasya lājño lābhārthaṃ hāsyakaraṃ vidūṣakasya vākyamāha--
GK16visa06cu:4983: doṣā guṇā guṇā doṣā yatra syurmṛdar(mādaṃ)
GK16visa06cu:4990: etāni cāṅgani nāṭakādiṣu sambhavantyapi vīthyāmavaśyaṃ vidheyāni spaṣṭatayā nāṭakādiṣu viniviṣṭānyapīhodāhṛtāni /
GK16visa06cu:4998: aṅgī hāsyarasastatra vīthyaṅgānāṃ sthitirna vā // VisSd_6.265 //
GK16visa06cu:5003: āśritya kañcana janaṃ saṃkīrṇamiti tadviduḥ // VisSd_6.266 //
GK16visa06cu:5014: idaṃ tu saṅkīrṇenaiva gatārthamiti muninā pṛthaṅnoktam /
GK16visa06cu:5016: tatra nāṭikā kḷptavṛttā syāt strīprāyā caturaṅkikā /
GK16visa06cu:5022: pade pade mānavatī tadvaśaḥ saṅgamo dvayoḥ /
GK16visa06cu:5023: vṛttiḥ syātkauśikī svalpavimarśāḥ sandhayaḥ punaḥ // VisSd_6.272 //
GK16visa06cu:5028: troṭakaṃ nāma tatprāhuḥ pratyaṅkaṃ savidūṣakam // VisSd_6.273 //
GK16visa06cu:5040: na ca viṣkambhako 'pyatra pracuraścādbhuto rasaḥ // VisSd_6.276 //
GK16visa06cu:5058: dāsī ca nāyikā vṛttiḥ kauśikī bhāratī tathā // VisSd_6.280 //
GK16visa06cu:5066: catastro nāyikāstatra trayo 'ṅkā iti kecana // VisSd_6.283 //
GK16visa06cu:5078: netā strī cāpyudāttātra sandhī ādyo tathāntimaḥ // VisSd_6.285 //
GK16visa06cu:5088: nepathye gīyate nāndī tathā tatra prarocanā // VisSd_6.287 //
GK16visa06cu:5097: hīnairbhāṣyā vibhāṣā syāt sā ca saptavidhā smṛtā /
GK16visa06cu:5098: prācyāvantī māgadhī ca śākārī ca tathāparā /
GK16visa06cu:5099: cāṇḍālī śāvarī caiva tathā bhīrīti bhedataḥ //
GK16visa06cu:5110: na tatra vṛttirbhavati bhāratī na ca kauśikī // VisSd_6.292 //
GK16visa06cu:5131: aśāntahāsyāśca rasā nāyako brāhmaṇo mataḥ // VisSd_6.296 //
GK16visa06cu:5153: svalpavṛttā sunepathyā vikhyātā sā vilāsikā // VisSd_6.302 //
GK16visa06cu:5191: hallīśa eka evāṅkaḥ saptāṣṭau daśa vā striyaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:5205: upanyāso 'tha vinyāso vibodhaḥ sādhvasaṃ tathā // VisSd_6.309 //
GK16visa06cu:5209: bhrāntināśo vibodhaḥ syānmithyākhyānaṃ tu sādhvasam // VisSd_6.311 //
GK16visa06cu:5215: eteṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ nāṭakaprakṛtitve 'pi yathaicityaṃ yathālābhaṃ nāṭakoktaviśeṣaparigrahaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:5216: yatra ca nāṭakoktasyāpi punarupādānaṃ tatra tatsadbhāvasya niyamaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:5233: taduktavastuno yacca punarupādānaṃ nāṭakāntara iti bodhyam /
GK16visa06cu:5245: dvābhyāṃ tu yugmakaṃ sāṃdānatikaṃ tribhiriṣyate // VisSd_6.314 //
GK16visa06cu:5252: “sāndrānandamanantamavyayamajaṃ yadyogino 'pi kṣaṇaṃ sākṣātkartumupāsate prati muhurdhyānaikatānāḥ param /
GK16visa06cu:5257: (vi, ṭa) sāndrānandamiti--yatparaṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ brahma kṣaṇamapi sākṣātkatudhyānaikatānā
GK16visa06cu:5258: dhyānamātrāviṣṭā yoginaḥ pratimuhurupāsate tadbrahma yā mathurāpurayuvatayaḥ kautukādāliṅgantītyādi tā dhanyaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:5268: (vi, ṭha) māninyā mānabhaṅgaprakāraṃ sakhyau kathayannāha--kiṃ karoṣītyādi /
GK16visa06cu:5269: he kānte / karopānte imāṃ gaṇḍasthalīṃ kimarthaṃ karoṣi ?
GK16visa06cu:5271: kuraṅgākṣīmiti vaktuṃ vayaṃ yāvadīhāmahe tāvanmadhuro madhupadhvaniḥ cūte āvirabhūt /
GK16visa06cu:5272: atra prathamaślokārtho dvitīyaśloka utkikarmatvena ukta iti ekavākyatā /
GK16visa06cu:5279: sargabandho mahākāvyaṃ tatraiko nāyakaḥ suraḥ // VisSd_6.315 //
GK16visa06cu:5281: ekavaṃśabhavā bhūpāḥ kulajā bahavo 'pi vā // VisSd_6.316 //
GK16visa06cu:5283: aṅgāni sarve 'pi rasāḥ sarve nāṭakasandhayaḥ // VisSd_6.317 //
GK16visa06cu:5293: catvārastasya vargāḥ syusteṣvekaṃ ca phalaṃ bhavet // VisSd_6.318 //
GK16visa06cu:5295: kvacinnindā khalādīnāṃ satāṃ ca guṇakīrtanam // VisSd_6.319 //
GK16visa06cu:5297: nāstisvalpā nātidīrghāḥ sargā aṣṭādhikā iha // VisSd_6.320 //
GK16visa06cu:5299: sargānte bhāvisargasya kathāyāḥ sūcanaṃ bhavet // VisSd_6.321 //
GK16visa06cu:5305: kavervṛttasya vā nāmnā nāyakasyetarasya vā // VisSd_6.324 //
GK16visa06cu:5309: (vi, ṇa) catvāra iti---dharmārthakāmamokṣā ye catvāro vargāsteṣvekamapi tatphalamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:5312: sāṅgopāṅga iti---amī sāndhyāsūryendvādayaḥ putrajanmāntā iha kāvye yathāyogaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ sāṅgopāṅgā varṇanīyā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:5324: sargopādeyeti---sarge upādeyā varṇitā yā kathā tayā sarganāmetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:5332: (vi, ta) bahuvacanamavivakṣitamiti---avasāna ekasyāpi anyavṛttikasya dṛṣṭa tvāt /
GK16visa06cu:5347: śiṣyaṃ prati guruṇāmākhyānaśāstrakathane yāḥ saṃjñā adhyāyarūpāstādṛśasaṃjñakā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:5389: vṛttagandhojjitaṃ gadyaṃ muktakaṃ vṛttagandhi ca // VisSd_6.330 //
GK16visa06cu:5415: (vi, bha) samarakaṇḍuleti--samarotsāhena kaṇḍule nibiḍe dṛḍhe bhujadaṇḍe kuṇḍalīkṛtakodaṇḍasya śiñjinyāḥ guṇasya ṭaṅkāreṇa ujjagaritaṃ vairinagaraṃ yena /
GK16visa06cu:5423: aniśaṃ viṣamānāṃ niśitānāṃ śarāṇaṃ visareṇa--pātena vidalitāḥ parighāḥ mudrarāḥ gadāśca yatra tādṛśaṃ parabalaṃ yasmāt,
GK16visa06cu:5425: guṇaratnasāgaretyādi---atra rephāntaṃ nāma dvayaṃ nāntañca sambodhanadvayamalpasamāsakam /
GK16visa06cu:5427: kathāyāṃ sarasaṃ vastu gadyaireva vinimitam // VisSd_6.332 //
GK16visa06cu:5439: asyāmanyakavīnāṃ ca vṛttaṃ padyaṃ kvacitkvacit // VisSd_6.334 //
GK16visa06cu:5451: āryeti--āryādicchandasāṃ madhye yena kenacicchandasā āśvasasya mukheādau anyāpadeśena--anyacchalena bhāvyarthasya vakṣyamāṇārthasya sūcanamityarthaḥ
GK16visa06cu:5455: iti daṇḍyācāryavacanāt kecit ākhyāyikā nāyakenaiva nibaddhavyā” ityāhuḥ,
GK16visa06cu:5463: (vi, ra) “ākhyāyikā nāyakenaiva nibaddhavyā” iti yad kenaciduktaṃ tad “āpitu“--ityādidaṇḍyācāryavacanādayuktamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa06cu:5493: iti sāhityadarpaṇo dṛśyaśravyakāvyanirūpaṇo nāma ṣaṣṭhaḥ paricchedaḥ /
